sources.title: HELEN'S MARRIAGE (1912)
sources.description: HELEN'S MARRIAGE Biograph Company, 425 ft., rel. May 23, 1912 dir. Mack Sennett, auth. Earl Hodge, cam. Percy Higginson cast: Mabel Normand, Eddie Dillon, Frank Opperman, Grace Henderson, Fred Mace, Dell Henderson, Wm. J. Butler, Charles H. West, Frank Evans, J. Jiquel Lanoe, Mack Sennett, William Beaudine filmed: 3/1912 Location: CA copyright: May 22, 1912

metadata.Plot: Helen and Tom try to elope, but papa catches them and drives Tom away with a gun. At first Tom's friends at the club give him the laugh, but next day when he tells them of a plan, which was suggested by seeing a motion picture company at work, they consent to help him, bringing his scheme to a successful finish.
metadata.Actors: Mabel Normand, Edward Dillon, Frank Opperman
